title: Truetype Export Problem
content:

comments.content: Have you tried running the font through the [Font Validator](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013084300/http:/www.microsoft.com/typography/FontValidator.mspx) tool? From the kind of error message you are getting, I suspect the problem is not something like names or export options but problems with glyph outlines or hints affecting rasterisation.
